wikitext.*:
<noinclude>{{month|August}}
Events that occurred on 1 August
==On Earth==
</noinclude>
* '''[[1896]]''' - [[John Benjamin Tolkien]], grandfather of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], dies.
* '''[[1917]]''' – [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] attends an annual [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Minden_Day Minden Day] Dinner at either Thirtle Bridge camp or Tunstall Hall.
* '''[[1937]]''' - Voice actor [[Ian Hogg]] is born.
* '''[[1950]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter 128]].
* '''[[1959]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] serves the first Mass of [[Robert Murray]].
* '''[[1962]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter 240]].
* '''[[1967]]''' - Actor [[Cameron Rhodes]] is born.
* '''[[1969]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to Mr Burrows|a letter to Mr Burrows]].
* '''[[1988]]''' - [[Mythcon 19]] in [[wikipedia:Berkeley, California|Berkeley]], [[wikipedia:California|California]].
* '''[[1993]]''' - [[Mythcon 24]] at [[wikipedia:University of Minnesota|University of Minnesota]], [[wikipedia:Minneapolis|Minneapolis]].
* '''[[1997]]''' - The German Tolkien Society [[Deutsche Tolkien Gesellschaft e.V.]] is founded.
* '''[[1999]]''' - [[Mythcon 30]] in [[wikipedia:Milwaukee|Milwaukee]], [[wikipedia:Wisconsin|Wisconsin]].
* '''[[2004]]''' - [[Mythcon 35]] at [[wikipedia:University of Michigan|University of Michigan]] in [[wikipedia:Ann Arbor, Michigan|Ann Arbor]].
* '''[[2008]]''' - [[Pauline Baynes]], [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]]'s favourite artist, dies.
* '''[[2015]]''' - [[Mythcon 46]] in Hotel Elegante, [[wikipedia:Colorado Springs, Colorado|Colorado Springs]].
